transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. People ride in me to go places. What am I?

hints.text: 🛣️ I travel on roads.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I can carry many people.
🎶 You might sing songs inside me.

transport.question: I float on the water and help people cross rivers and lakes. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move.
🛶 I can be big or small.
🐥 Sometimes ducks swim beside me.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places very quickly. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
✈️ You need a ticket to ride me.
🌍 I can travel all around the world.

transport.question: I go on a track and carry lots of people from one city to another. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special path.
🚂 I make a 'choo choo' sound.
💺 Lots of people can sit on me.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: ⚙️ You need to pedal.
🧑‍🦽 I don't use any gas.
🚧 You can ride me in the park.

transport.question: I am a car that helps people who are hurt. I have a siren and flashing lights. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I make a loud noise.
🧑‍⚕️ Doctors and nurses use me.
🚑 I help in emergencies.

transport.question: I am a big truck that carries lots of things on the road. I'm often very long. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I deliver goods to shops.
🛣️ I travel long distances.
🚧 I have many wheels.

transport.question: I fly like an airplane, but I have spinning blades on top to help me go up and down. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place.
🛬 I can land in small spaces.
🚨 I'm used for rescues or tours.

transport.question: I go very fast through space and can take astronauts to the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I have a countdown before I launch.
👩‍🚀 People wear special suits when they ride me.
🌕 I can travel to other planets.

transport.question: I am a train that goes under the city, helping people travel quickly to different places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I travel in tunnels.
🚦 You need to go down stairs to find me.
🗺️ I can connect different parts of the city.

cosmos.question: I'm big and yellow and give the Earth light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I shine bright during the day
🔥 I'm very, very hot!
🌎 Plants need me to grow

cosmos.question: I'm round and sometimes you can see me at night. Sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm just a sliver. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Werewolves like me when I'm full.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.
🧀 People say I'm made of cheese, but I'm not!

cosmos.question: I am a bright light in the night sky, but I'm very far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the darkness.
🔭 You can see many of me.
🌌 I'm much bigger than the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock and I go around the Sun. I am where you live. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 We live on me!
💧 I have lots of water.
🌱 I have plants and animals.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture. What am I called?

hints.text: 🐻 One is named after a big animal.
✨ People used to tell stories about me.
🌌 I'm made of many stars.

cosmos.question: I am a very fast rock that falls from space and sometimes burns up in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌠 Sometimes people call me a shooting star.
🔥 I can make a big crash if I land.
🪨 I am made of rock and metal.

cosmos.question: I'm a big group of stars, gas, and dust, and Earth lives in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 My name makes you think of milk!
🌀 I'm shaped like a spiral.
✨ I contain billions of stars.

cosmos.question: I am a place with many planets going around a star. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ The Earth is part of me.
🪐 I have eight major planets.
🚀 We use rockets to explore me.

cosmos.question: I am a planet known for my beautiful rings. What planet am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rocks.
💨 I am a gas giant.
🪐 I am the second-largest planet in our solar system.

cosmos.question: I am the force that keeps the planets going around the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple falling from a tree is an example of me.
🧲 I pull things together.
⚖️ I am what keeps you on the ground.
